mapper.select: SELECT id, organization_team_permission_id organizationTeamPermissionId, organization_team_menu_id organizationTeamMenuId FROM base_organization_team_permission_menu WHERE organization_team_permission_id = #{organizationTeamPermissionId} AND organization_team_menu_id = #{organizationTeamMenuId}

SELECT botm.pid, botm.id, botm. NAME, botm. CODE, botm.icon, botm.is_used isUsed, botm.create_date createDate, botm.remark, IF ( botpm.organization_team_menu_id IS NULL, FALSE, TRUE ) isChoose FROM base_organization_team_menu botm LEFT JOIN base_organization_team_permission_menu botpm ON botm.id = botpm.organization_team_menu_id AND botpm.organization_team_permission_id = #{organizationTeamPermissionId} WHERE botm.is_used = 1
and botm.`name` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{name}), '%')
and botm.`code` like CONCAT(CONCAT('%', #{code}), '%')
